net.sourceforge.metrics.builder
Class MetricsBuilder

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.core.internal.events.InternalBuilder
      org.eclipse.core.resources.IncrementalProjectBuilder
          net.sourceforge.metrics.builder.MetricsBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
public class MetricsBuilder
extends org.eclipse.core.resources.IncrementalProjectBuilder

builder to (re)calculate metrics for modified java resources.

Author:
Frank Sauer

Nested Class Summary
(package private) static class MetricsBuilder.AddedCommand
          AddedCommand calculates the metrics for a new/moved resource
static class MetricsBuilder.CalculatorThread
           
(package private) static class MetricsBuilder.ChangedCommand
          ChangedCommand removes cached metricas and recalculates them
(package private) static class MetricsBuilder.Command
          Base class for the commands
(package private)  class MetricsBuilder.FilterResult
          Contains the result of the resource to IJavaElement translation/filtering and knows how to process it in the context of a full build as well as an incremental build
(package private)  class MetricsBuilder.MetricsBuildVisitor
          implements both the ResourceVisitor for a full build and the DeltaVisitor for an incremental build.
static class MetricsBuilder.Queue
           
(package private) static class MetricsBuilder.RemovedCommand
          RemovedCommand removes the cached metrics
